name: Unofficial Linkle 3.0 Armor Icons
desc:
Replaces all vanilla armor icons with unofficial Linkle 3.0 ones.  
Vanilla-esque HD quality version.

multi.name: [General] Uniform dye icons
multi.desc: Makes all dye variations of an armor piece have similarly cropped icons. See the images on Gamebanana for reference.

multi.name: Aryll Dye Over Hylian Hood
multi.desc: Icon for EvanM0816's 'Aryll Dye Over Hylian Hood for Linkle 3.0' mod.

multi.name: Bayonetta Glasses over Vah Medoh Helm
multi.desc: Icon for EvanM0816's 'Bayonetta Glasses over Vah Medoh Helm' mod.

multi.name: Champion Tunic Cosplay
multi.desc: Icon for EvanM0816's '(LINKLE 3.0 REFIT) Champion Tunic Cosplay' mod.

multi.name: Classic Sky Set
multi.desc: Icons for EvanM0816's 'Linkle's Classic Sky Set (Linkle 3.0)' mod.

multi.name: Island Lobster Shirt Cosplay
multi.desc: Icon for EvanM0816's '(LINKLE 3.0 REFIT) Island Lobster Shirt Cosplay' mod.

single.name: Nintendo Switch Shirt replacement
single.desc: Icon for mods that replace Nintendo Switch Shirt. Optional.

options.name: Pride Shirt
options.desc: Improved icon for HGStone's 'Pride Shirt for Link and Linkle 2/3' mod.

options.name: Evan's T-Shirt Collection: Wind Waker Linkle
options.desc: Icon for the 'Wind Waker Linkle Merch Style T-Shirt' option of EvanM0816's 'Evan's Linkle 3.0 T-Shirt Collection' mod.

options.name: Evan's T-Shirt Collection: Bayonetta
options.desc: Icon for the 'Bayonetta Minimalist T-Shirt' option of EvanM0816's 'Evan's Linkle 3.0 T-Shirt Collection' mod.

options.name: Evan's T-Shirt Collection: Rave
options.desc: Icon for the 'Rave T-Shirt' option of EvanM0816's 'Evan's Linkle 3.0 T-Shirt Collection' mod.

options.name: Evan's T-Shirt Collection: Sora
options.desc: Icon for the 'Sora Dive to the Heart T-Shirt' option of EvanM0816's 'Evan's Linkle 3.0 T-Shirt Collection' mod.

options.name: Evan's T-Shirt Collection: Yoshi
options.desc: Icon for the 'Yoshi Pixel Art T-Shirt' option of EvanM0816's 'Evan's Linkle 3.0 T-Shirt Collection' mod.

options.name: Old Bandanna
options.desc: Improved icons for HGStone's 'Old Bandanna for Link, Linkle 2/3 or Zelda' mod.

options.name: True Old Bandanna
options.desc: Improved icons for PalioPolio's 'True Old Bandanna for Linkle (and Zelda)' mod.

options.name: True Old Bandanna (colour match)
options.desc: Improved icons for the colour match version of PalioPolio's 'True Old Bandanna for Linkle (and Zelda)' mod.

single.name: Wind Set Seifuku Recolor
single.desc: Icon for EvanM0816's 'Wind Set Seifuku Recolors' mod. Optional.
